QuestData.Title: Before the Gate of Horror
QuestData.Description: The Conflagration, the ground before Corp'rethar, south of the Ironwall Rampart, is where the Lich King's elite soldiers have formed up to defend the citadel.$B$BLed by a contingent of death knights, a legion of skeletal reavers bars the way. I fear that even when these reavers fall, the Scourge will simply reconstitute them and send them back at us.$B$BI've come up with a plan to stop this, but I have no way of knowing if it will work. Take this solution and use it to dissolve the remains of the reavers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Thassarian, aboard the Skybreaker, wants you to use the Volatile Acid to dissolve the corpses of 6 Skeletal Reavers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you tested the solution out on the reavers?
QuestData.RewardText: <Thassarian listens as you describe your successful tests.>$B$BSo the acid worked? Good. We'll need it when the army goes up against the reavers in force.
